projects.name: Sentiment Analysis of Product Reviews using Machine Learning
projects.description: Developed a Machine Learning model to unlock the sentiment behind online product reviews, classifying them as positive or negative. Implemented and compared Multinomial Nave Bayes, Logistic Regression, Linear SVC, and Random Forest classifiers and Utilized Natural Language Processing (NLP) techniques for data pre-processing. Achieved an accuracy of 88.1% with Linear SVC, outperforming other models.

projects.name: Hostel Management System
projects.description: Developed a comprehensive Hostel Management System using Java Swing for UI and JDBC for database interaction. Implemented role-based access control for wardens and students. Enabled warden to manage student registrations, room additions, and deletions. Allowed students to book hostels, make payments, and view roommate information. Utilized MySQL database for efficient data storage and retrieval.

projects.name: Online Banking System
projects.description: Developed a C program for a comprehensive online banking system. Implemented user registration, login, and account management features. Enabled functionalities like balance inquiry, fund deposit, cash withdrawal, and online transfer. Utilized file handling for user data storage and retrieval.

full_output.name: Venkata Ramamohan Rao Botla
